featured.text: The feathers of peacocks are considered the most 25 part of the bird because the eye-shaped markings on them are associated with “evil eyes.”
In places like India, the peacock is considered lucky because the great many “eyes” on its feathers are said to alert it to 23 evil.

definition.zh_def: 羽毛，鳥類的外部覆蓋物，通常輕盈且柔軟。
definition.en_def: A feather is a lightweight, soft structure that covers the body of birds.
definition.example: The bird spread its colorful feathers to attract a mate.
